long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brings back the old navbar on github.com and gist.github.com. Only works when you are logged in and a light GitHub theme is enabled.

Note (August 2023): As of the latest navbar design, this extension only affects gist.github.com.

Extra features:
- Supports the new code search feature preview.
- The search box is wider when focused.
- You can resize textareas to larger than 500px in height.

This software is not affiliated or endorsed by GitHub.

Source code: https://github.com/stefansundin/github-light-navbar
